title: Help & Support
subtitle: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with support.

createUser.question: How do I create a new user?
createUser.answer: Navigate to User Management > New User from the sidebar. Fill in the required information and click Save to create the user.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: Click on "Forgot Password" on the login page. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

manageRoles.question: How do I manage user roles?
manageRoles.answer: Go to Roles & Permissions from the sidebar. You can view existing roles, create new ones, and assign permissions.

viewSessions.question: How do I view my active sessions?
viewSessions.answer: Navigate to Sessions from the sidebar to see all your active sessions. You can terminate any session from there.

changeSettings.question: How do I change my account settings?
changeSettings.answer: Go to Settings from the sidebar to update your profile information, notification preferences, and security settings.
